data.prayer: Father, encourage the 13,910 believers in Manus to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Manus, Papua New Guinea
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 60,500 citizens of Manus, Papua New Guinea, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Lord, there are 43,190 people in the state of Manus who claim Christianity, but may have never read the Bible. Please challenge them today to read the Bible for themselves.
data.verse: All Scripture is God-breathed and is useful for teaching, rebuking, correcting and training in righteousness

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Manus, Papua New Guinea to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 46,590 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Jew, English-speaking people.
Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Manus
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Manus, Papua New Guinea.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 13,910 believers in Manus that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

location.name: Manus
location.people_groups_list: Kalou, Kamura, Awun, Kanum, Enkelembu, Nanubae
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Kalou (2,200), Kamura (1,600), Awun (600), Kanum, Enkelembu (400), Nanubae (1,300)
